autocoop.utils package¶

Submodules¶

autocoop.utils.utils module¶

autocoop.utils.utils.int_to_bytes(number, n_bytes)[source]¶

Returns a bytestring for an integer

Parameters:
  • number – Integer to convert
  • n_bytes – Number of bytes to convert to
Returns:

Bytestring representing integer
autocoop.utils.utils.print_region(addr_start, value, n_bytes)[source]¶

Prints a memory region similar to hexdump

Parameters:
  • addr_start – Starting address
  • value – Memory region to print
  • n_bytes – Number of bytes to print
